title: Gaussian Sampling
body_html:
In the release phase of the code of our article : Deep Learning for Physical Processes: Incorporating Prior Scientific Knowledge ( https://openreview.net/pdf?id=By4HsfWAZ ) we have implemented a Gaussian grid sampling scheme :
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.c
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THCUNN/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.cu

Does it make sense to add it to the main pytorch repo ?
body_text:
In the release phase of the code of our article : Deep Learning for Physical Processes: Incorporating Prior Scientific Knowledge ( https://openreview.net/pdf?id=By4HsfWAZ ) we have implemented a Gaussian grid sampling scheme :
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.c
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THCUNN/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.cu
Does it make sense to add it to the main pytorch repo ?
body:
In the release phase of the code of our article : Deep Learning for Physical Processes: Incorporating Prior Scientific Knowledge ( https://openreview.net/pdf?id=By4HsfWAZ ) we have implemented a Gaussian grid sampling scheme :  
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.c
https://github.com/pajotarthur/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THCUNN/SpatialGridSamplerGaussian.cu

Does it make sense to add it to the main pytorch repo ?
